alert.note: Alert for Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:27AM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Upper Wolf River near Shawano affecting Shawano County. Wolf River at New London affecting Waupaca, Outagamie and Winnebago Counties. Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Waupaca, Shawano and Outagamie Counties. Embarrass River near Embarrass affecting Waupaca and Shawano Counties. For the Lower Wolf River...including Shiocton, New London...for the Embarrass River...including Embarrass...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Upper Wolf River near Shawano. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, flood waters spread over boat docks near County Highway A near Shawano. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
